thread.title: Live: Large numbers turn out for Rep. Emmer's town hall in Sartell
thread.title_full: Live: Large numbers turn out for Rep. Emmer's town hall in Sartell

author: Terry Sauer
title: Live: Large numbers turn out for Rep. Emmer's town hall in Sartell
text: close - People are lining up early in Sartell to attend Rep. Tom Emmer's town hall meeting. Volunteers brought snacks. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/C5TkyqQUYAAM8_0.jpg by Glen Stubbe via twitter 2/22/2017 11:21:20 PM Already over 100 people in line to see Rep Tom Emmer's town hall meeting in Sartell in a room with 76 chairs. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/C5TjMIUVMAAkW4K.jpg by Glen Stubbe via twitter 2/22/2017 11:14:11 PM People in line at Emmer town hall say they're here to to talk to their representative about health care, climate change and immigration. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/C5TcanVUkAA6hCZ.jpg by Erin Golden via twitter 2/22/2017 10:44:04 PM Background: A day before a scheduled town hall meeting, U.S. Rep. Tom Emmer distributed a cautionary news release warning that he would leave if the event gets raucous. “Behavior that goes beyond the bounds of civil discourse is threatening to drive into extinction the civic institution known as a town-hall meeting,” read the missive from Emmer’s office. Typically low-key, often held in community ­centers or church meeting rooms, they rarely attract major attention. But recent weeks have seen opponents of President Donald Trump pack town hall meetings hosted by Republican members of Congress, and publicly call out lawmakers with no ­public events scheduled. by Colleen Kelly 2/22/2017 10:37:31 PM Food lined up by volunteers for people waiting outside Emmer town hall. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/C5TaaaaVYAASCBL.jpg by Erin Golden via twitter 2/22/2017 10:35:20 PM Signs in the line growing outside Congressman Emmer town hall in Sartell. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/C5TaB2EVMAEyWaV.jpg by Erin Golden via twitter 2/22/2017 10:33:38 PM Three hours to Congressman Tom Emmer's town hall in Sartell and there's already a line out the door. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/C5TTwemVYAEjfT9.jpg by Erin Golden via twitter 2/22/2017 10:25:13 PM
